title: wine_Waterloo_2014_The_Forge_of_Beulah_Land_Red_(Paso_Robles)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 117478.
country: US.
description: From the Preston Vineyard in Templeton Gap comes this blend of 29% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Cabernet Franc, 21% Petit Verdot, 13% Merlot and 12% Malbec, which is full of violet, deeply red cherries and cranberries and charred meat on the nose. The palate starts with a somewhat sweet touch of red currant but then tightens on elegant graphite, potpourri, cigar box and white-pepper flavors, all framed by chalky tannins..
designation: The Forge of Beulah Land.
points: 91.
price: 42.0.
province: California.
region_1: Paso Robles.
region_2: Central Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
title: Waterloo 2014 The Forge of Beulah Land Red (Paso Robles).
variety: Bordeaux-style Red Blend.
winery: Waterloo.
